snippet: This beef-stew-in-a-pastry shell is the last tradition left from the glory days of Michigan’s Copper Harbor.
abstract: John Willoughby article offers recipe for Copper Country Pasties, adapted from his grandmother's recipe for regional specialty that originated in Copper Harbor, Mich.
lead_paragraph: This beef-stew-in-a-pastry shell is the last tradition left from the glory days of Michigan’s Copper Harbor.
